definition.content:
Bot Defense protects your Internet applications from automated attacks by identifying and mitigating malicious or bad bots.

Gain comprehensive insights into your organization's bot traffic and enhance security by monitoring F5 Bot Defense events with this dashboard.


For further reading, see:

- [F5 Distributed Cloud Services Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/f5-distributed-cloud/)

Tips
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Bot Defense logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](https://app.datadoghq.com/security).
